mapper.select: SELECT adminid, type, state, rtime, mtime, id, passwd, name, description, publisherid, ( select name from publisher where publisherid = admin.publisherid ) as publishername FROM admin WHERE adminid=#{adminid} LIMIT 1

SELECT adminid, type, state, rtime, mtime, id, passwd, name, description, publisherid, ( select name from publisher where publisherid = admin.publisherid ) as publishername FROM admin WHERE id=#{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT count(1) FROM admin WHERE 1=1 AND id like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') AND name like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%')

SELECT adminid, type, state, rtime, mtime, id, passwd, name, description, publisherid, ( select name from publisher where publisherid = admin.publisherid ) as publishername FROM admin WHERE 1=1 AND id like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') AND name like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') ORDER BY adminid DESC
LIMIT #{count} offset #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin ( type, state, id, passwd, name, description, publisherid, mtime ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{state}, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{description}, #{publisherid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE admin SET type = #{type}, state = #{state}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, publisherid = #{publisherid}, mtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE adminid = #{adminid}
UPDATE admin SET passwd = #{passwd}, mtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE adminid = #{adminid}
